titles.title: Border Enforcement Accountability, Oversight, and Community Engagement Act of 2017
Border Enforcement Accountability, Oversight, and Community Engagement Act of 2017

To increase transparency, accountability, and community engagement within U.S. Customs and Border Protection, provide independent oversight of border security activities, improve training for U.S. Customs and Border Protection agents and officers, and for other purposes.
Border Enforcement Accountability, Oversight, and Community Engagement Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
